feed.title: Derivation Paths for Single Key Taproot Scripts

entry.title: Derivation Paths for Single Key Taproot Scripts
entry.summary: The co-founder and CTO of SatoshiLabs, Pavol Rusnak, has proposed a new Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) that follows the pattern of his previous successful proposals, BIP43, BIP44, and BIP84. The details of the proposal have not been disclosed yet.
